title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 June 20 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Friday, 20 June 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Friday, June 20 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex covers the latest on America's emerging police state, surveillance state and the utter destruction of America's borders. 

Google and Microsoft have agreed to include kill switches in all of their new smartphones, which could be used by authorities to stifle political dissent. 

Cops in Colorado responded to a shooting outside an amphitheater by forcing thousands of concert goers through a mandatory checkpoint, which included illegal searches of drivers who had to wait hours to leave the area. 

Current congressional candidate and former presidential nominee Bob Barr joins the show to expose key information in the ongoing scandal surrounding the Department of Veterans Affairs, which the Washington Times said was more concerned with installing solar panels in its facilities than saving the lives of dying vets. 

Personal security expert Chad Cooper also joins the broadcast to break down the latest developments in the emergency preparedness industry.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
